Joyce Anima Misa Amoah bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ede ejije na onye nduzi.

Ọ bụ nwanyí na-ede ihe omume ejije  ritere ihe nrite mmeri nke  BBC. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Kwaw Ansah's ‘Love Brewed In African Pot’ na ‘Heritage Africa, Adams Apples na onye so na nduzi "Wogbɛ Jɛkɛ” stage play. O gosiputara dị ka Nana na The Burial of Kojo
Ọ bụ General Manager nke ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na nka, Sapphire Ghana.
